00019 #include "feature_extraction.h"
00020 
00021 namespace ipl{
00022 
00023 CFeatures::CFeatures()
00024 {
00025         m_MomOK=false;
00026         m_CentrMomOK=false;
00027         m_CentrNormMomOK=false;
00028         m_HuOK=false;
00029 }
00030 
00031 CFeatures::~CFeatures()
00032 {
00033 }
00034 
00035 CPoint2D<FLOAT32> CFeatures::DeriveCenterOfMassBinary(const CPixelGroup& PixelGroup)
00036 {
00037         T2DFloat CM;
00038         CM=k_DeriveCenterOfMassBinary(PixelGroup.GetConstTPixelGroupPtr());
00039         return CPoint2D<FLOAT32>(CM.x,CM.y);
00040 }
00041 
00042 bool CFeatures::DeriveMomentsGrayTone(const CPixelGroup& PixelGroup,double Background,
00043                                                                          unsigned int MaxOrder)
00044 {
00045         bool returnValue=k_DeriveMomentsGrayTone(PixelGroup.GetConstTPixelGroupPtr(),Background,MaxOrder,&m_Moments);
00046         if (returnValue==false)
00047         {
00048                 ostringstream ost;
00049                 ost << "CFeatures::DeriveMomentsGrayTone() Failed deriving moments" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00050                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00051         }
00052         else
00053                 m_MomOK=true;
00054         return returnValue;
00055 }
00056 
00057 bool CFeatures::DeriveMomentsBinary(const CPixelGroup& PixelGroup,unsigned int MaxOrder)
00058 {
00059         //bool returnValue=k_DeriveMomentsBinary(&PixelGroup,MaxOrder,&m_Moments);
00060         bool returnValue=k_DeriveMomentsBinary(PixelGroup.GetConstTPixelGroupPtr(),MaxOrder,&m_Moments);
00061         if (returnValue==false)
00062         {
00063                 ostringstream ost;
00064                 ost << "CFeatures::DeriveMomentsBinary() Failed deriving moments" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00065                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00066         }
00067         else
00068                 m_MomOK=true;
00069         return returnValue;
00070 }
00071 
00072 bool CFeatures::DeriveCentralMoments()
00073 {
00074         if (m_MomOK==false)
00075         {
00076                 ostringstream ost;
00077                 ost << "CFeatures::DeriveCentralMoments() Simple moments not derived" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00078                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00079                 return false;
00080         }
00081         bool returnValue=k_DeriveCentralMoments(&m_Moments,&m_CentrMom);
00082         if (returnValue==false)
00083         {
00084                 ostringstream ost;
00085                 ost << "CFeatures::DeriveMomentsGrayTone() Failed deriving moments" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00086                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00087         }
00088         else
00089                 m_CentrMomOK=true;
00090         return returnValue;
00091 }
00092 
00093 bool CFeatures::DeriveCentralNormMoments()
00094 {
00095         if (m_MomOK==false)
00096         {
00097                 ostringstream ost;
00098                 ost << "CFeatures::DeriveCentralNormMoments() Simple moments not derived" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00099                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00100                 return false;
00101         }
00102         bool returnValue=k_DeriveCentralNormMoments(&m_Moments,&m_CentrNormMom);
00103         if (returnValue==false)
00104         {
00105                 ostringstream ost;
00106                 ost << "CFeatures::DeriveCentralNormMoments() Failed deriving moments" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00107                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00108         }
00109         else
00110                 m_CentrNormMomOK=true;
00111         return returnValue;
00112 }
00113 
00114 bool CFeatures::DeriveHuFromCentralMom()
00115 {
00116         if (m_CentrMomOK==false)
00117         {
00118                 ostringstream ost;
00119                 ost << "CFeatures::DeriveHuFromCentralMom() Simple moments not derived" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00120                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00121                 return false;
00122         }
00123         bool returnValue=k_DeriveHuInvariants(&m_CentrMom,&(m_Hu[0]));
00124         if (returnValue==false)
00125         {
00126                 ostringstream ost;
00127                 ost << "CFeatures::DeriveHuFromCentralMom() Failed deriving moments" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00128                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00129         }
00130         else
00131                 m_HuOK=true;
00132         return returnValue;
00133 }
00134 
00135 bool CFeatures::DeriveHuFromCentralNormMom()
00136 {
00137         if (m_CentrNormMomOK==false)
00138         {
00139                 ostringstream ost;
00140                 ost << "CFeatures::DeriveHuFromCentralNormMom() Simple moments not derived" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00141                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00142                 return false;
00143         }
00144         bool returnValue=k_DeriveHuInvariants(&m_CentrNormMom,&(m_Hu[0]));
00145         if (returnValue==false)
00146         {
00147                 ostringstream ost;
00148                 ost << "CFeatures::DeriveHuFromCentralNormMom() Failed deriving moments" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00149                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00150         }
00151         else
00152                 m_HuOK=true;
00153         return returnValue;
00154 }
